title: Build-A-Bear CEO: 'No Way Around' Tariff Impact
description: Sharon Price John, Build-A-Bear Workshop President & CEO, says strong preemptive actions in the first half will create a tough comparison next year. She tells “The Close” that tariff-affected product will still run through the company’s system in the first half of 2026, with no real way around it. (Source: Bloomberg)
